images.name: Executive-King-One-Bedroom-Suite-Interior-View--Executive-King-One-Bedroom-Suite-Interior-View
images.caption: Executive King One Bedroom Suite Interior View
images.alt:
The Executive Suites are designed in classic Manhattan residential style with high ceilings, and are situated in the interior side of the hotel. The elegantly designed living room features a comfortable sofa and coffee table opposite the 40‚Äù wall mounted TV and console with mini bar.  There are 2 side chairs and side table along at the far side of the living room. An executive writing desk and chair completes the room. 
The comfortable bedroom features a king sized bed, an armchair with side table on the far side of the room. The full bathroom, located in the bedroom, features a glass-enclosed shower, soaking tub with oversized showerheads, plush bathrobes, towels and luxurious Etro bath amenities. Most Executive Suites feature a half bathroom near the entrance to the suite. Some feature a kitchenette instead.
